thread.title: Arizona bans Uber driverless car tests after fatal crash

title: Arizona bans Uber driverless car tests after fatal crash
text:
Arizona bans Uber driverless car tests after fatal crash 4:39pm IST - 01:04 
The governor of Arizona has suspended Uber's ability to test self-driving cars on public roads in the state following a fatal crash last week that killed a 49-year-old pedestrian.   
The governor of Arizona has suspended Uber's ability to test self-driving cars on public roads in the state following a fatal crash last week that killed a 49-year-old pedestrian.  //reut.rs/2pIB3vW
